import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import "../assets/css/Details.scss"; const Details = () => { let { id_prod } = useParams(); const url = "http://localhost:4000"; const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${url}/products/${id_prod}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(data)); fetch(`${url}/categories`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setCategories(data)); }, [id_prod]); const cate = categories.find((c) => c.id === products.id_cate); console.log(categories); return (
{cate.name.toUpperCase()}

{products.name}

ABOUT
    {products.description.map((d, i) => (
  • {d}
    • ))}
{products.img.map((d, i) => ( ))}
{products.price} USD

SIZES

M
L
XL
XXL
); }; export default Details;
